about_the_game:
Soft Body is a meditative action game where you control two beautiful, gooey snakes at the same time. In the game, you paint the world with your body, and as you do so, the world changes around you and reveals new obstacles and challenges. The action is tense, and the mood and aesthetic is contemplative and calm.

The demo includes Soft Game tutorial and Chapter 1, and the first 10 levels of Hard Game.
